# `into bool` for [conversions](/commands/categories/conversions.md)

<div class='command-title'>Convert value to boolean.</div>

## Signature

```> into bool {flags} ...rest```

## Parameters

 -  `...rest`: For a data structure input, convert data at the given cell paths.


## Input/output types:

| input     | output |
| --------- | ------ |
| bool      | bool   |
| int       | bool   |
| list\<any\> | table  |
| number    | bool   |
| record    | record |
| string    | bool   |
| table     | table  |
## Examples

Convert value to boolean in table
```nu
> [[value]; ['false'] ['1'] [0] [1.0] [true]] | into bool value
╭───┬───────╮
│ # │ value │
├───┼───────┤
│ 0 │ false │
│ 1 │ true  │
│ 2 │ false │
│ 3 │ true  │
│ 4 │ true  │
╰───┴───────╯

```

Convert bool to boolean
```nu
> true | into bool
true
```

convert int to boolean
```nu
> 1 | into bool
true
```

convert float to boolean
```nu
> 0.3 | into bool
true
```

convert float string to boolean
```nu
> '0.0' | into bool
false
```

convert string to boolean
```nu
> 'true' | into bool
true
```
